verses.verse: Then the prophets, <S%H5029><s%> Haggai <S%H2292><s%> the prophet, <S%H5029><s%> and Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1247><s%> of Iddo, <S%H5714><s%> prophesied <S%H5013><s%> to the Jews <S%H3062><s%> that were in Judah <S%H3061><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3390><s%> in the name <S%H8036><s%> of the God <S%H426><s%> of Israel, <S%H3479><s%> even to them.

Then <S%H116><s%> rose <S%H6965><s%> up Zerubbabel <S%H2217><s%> the son <S%H1247><s%> of Shealtiel, <S%H7597><s%> and Jeshua <S%H3443><s%> the son <S%H1247><s%> of Jozadak, <S%H3136><s%> and began <S%H8271><s%> to build <S%H1124><s%> the house <S%H1005><s%> of God <S%H426><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> is at Jerusalem: <S%H3390><s%> and with them were the prophets <S%H5029><s%> of God <S%H426><s%> helping <S%H5582><s%> them.

At the same time <S%H2166><s%> came <S%H858><s%> to them Tatnai, <S%H8674><s%> governor <S%H6347><s%> on this side <S%H5675><s%> the river, <S%H5103><s%> and Shetharboznai <S%H8370><s%>and their companions, <S%H3675><s%> and said <S%H560><s%> thus <S%H3652><s%> to them, Who <S%H4479><s%> has commanded <S%H7761><s%> <S%H2942><s%> you to build <S%H1124><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> house, <S%H1005><s%> and to make <S%H3635><s%> up this <S%H1836><s%> wall? <S%H846><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> said <S%H560><s%> we to them after this <S%H3660><s%> manner, What <S%H4479><s%> are the names <S%H8036><s%> of the men <S%H1400><s%> that make <S%H1124><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> building? <S%H1147><s%>

But the eye <S%H5870><s%> of their God <S%H426><s%> was on the elders <S%H7868><s%> of the Jews, <S%H3062><s%> that they could not cause them to cease, <S%H989><s%> till <S%H5705><s%> the matter <S%H2941><s%> came <S%H1946><s%> to Darius: <S%H1868><s%> and then <S%H116><s%> they returned <S%H8421><s%> answer <S%H8421><s%> by letter <S%H5407><s%> concerning <S%H5922><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> matter.

The copy <S%H6573><s%> of the letter <S%H104><s%> that Tatnai, <S%H8674><s%> governor <S%H6347><s%> on this side <S%H5675><s%> the river, <S%H5103><s%> and Shetharboznai <S%H8370><s%>and his companions <S%H3675><s%> the Apharsachites, <S%H671><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> were on this side <S%H5675><s%> the river, <S%H5103><s%> sent <S%H7972><s%> to Darius <S%H1868><s%> the king: <S%H4430><s%>

They sent <S%H7972><s%> a letter <S%H6600><s%> to him, wherein <S%H1459><s%> was written <S%H3790><s%> thus; <S%H1836><s%> To Darius <S%H1868><s%> the king, <S%H4430><s%> all <S%H3606><s%> peace. <S%H8001><s%>

Be it known <S%H3046><s%> to the king, <S%H4430><s%> that we went <S%H236><s%> into the province <S%H4083><s%> of Judea, <S%H3061><s%> to the house <S%H1005><s%> of the great <S%H7229><s%> God, <S%H426><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is built <S%H1124><s%> with great <S%H1560><s%> stones, <S%H69><s%> and timber <S%H636><s%> is laid <S%H7760><s%> in the walls, <S%H3797><s%> and this <S%H1791><s%> work <S%H5673><s%> goes <S%H5648><s%> fast <S%H629><s%> on, and prospers <S%H6744><s%> in their hands. <S%H3028><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> asked <S%H7593><s%> we those <S%H479><s%> elders, <S%H7868><s%> and said <S%H560><s%> to them thus, <S%H3660><s%> Who <S%H4479><s%> commanded <S%H7761><s%> <S%H2942><s%> you to build <S%H1124><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> house, <S%H1005><s%> and to make <S%H3635><s%> up these <S%H1836><s%> walls? <S%H846><s%>

We asked <S%H7593><s%> their names <S%H8036><s%> also, <S%H638><s%> to certify <S%H3046><s%> you, that we might write <S%H3790><s%> the names <S%H8036><s%> of the men <S%H1400><s%> that were the chief <S%H7217><s%> of them.

And thus <S%H3660><s%> they returned <S%H8421><s%> us answer, <S%H6600><s%> saying, <S%H560><s%> We are the servants <S%H5649><s%> of the God <S%H426><s%> of heaven <S%H8065><s%> and earth, <S%H772><s%> and build <S%H1124><s%> the house <S%H1005><s%> that was built <S%H1124><s%> these <S%H1836><s%> many <S%H7690><s%> years <S%H8140><s%> ago, <S%H6928><s%> which a great <S%H7229><s%> king <S%H4430><s%> of Israel <S%H3479><s%> built <S%H1124><s%> and set <S%H3635><s%> up.

But after <S%H4481><s%> that our fathers <S%H2><s%> had provoked <S%H7265><s%> the God <S%H426><s%> of heaven <S%H8065><s%> to wrath, <S%H7265><s%> he gave <S%H3052><s%> them into the hand <S%H3028><s%> of Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> of Babylon, <S%H895><s%> the Chaldean, <S%H3777><s%> who destroyed <S%H5642><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> house, <S%H1005><s%> and carried <S%H1541><s%> the people <S%H5972><s%> away <S%H1541><s%> into Babylon. <S%H895><s%>

But in the first <S%H2298><s%> year <S%H8140><s%> of Cyrus <S%H3567><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> of Babylon <S%H895><s%> the same king <S%H4430><s%> Cyrus <S%H3567><s%> made <S%H7761><s%> a decree <S%H2942><s%> to build <S%H1124><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> house <S%H1005><s%> of God. <S%H426><s%>

And the vessels <S%H3984><s%> also <S%H638><s%> of gold <S%H1722><s%> and silver <S%H3702><s%> of the house <S%H1005><s%> of God, <S%H426><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%> took <S%H5312><s%> out of the temple <S%H1965><s%> that was in Jerusalem, <S%H3390><s%> and brought <S%H2987><s%> them into the temple <S%H1965><s%> of Babylon, <S%H895><s%> those <S%H1994><s%> did Cyrus <S%H3567><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> take <S%H5312><s%> out of the temple <S%H1965><s%> of Babylon, <S%H895><s%> and they were delivered <S%H3052><s%> to one, whose name <S%H8036><s%> was Sheshbazzar, <S%H8339><s%> whom <S%H1768><s%> he had made <S%H7761><s%> governor; <S%H6347><s%>

And said <S%H560><s%> to him, Take <S%H5376><s%> these <S%H412><s%> vessels, <S%H3984><s%> go, <S%H236><s%> carry <S%H5182><s%> them into the temple <S%H1965><s%> that is in Jerusalem, <S%H3390><s%> and let the house <S%H1005><s%> of God <S%H426><s%> be built <S%H1124><s%> in his place. <S%H870><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> came <S%H858><s%> the same <S%H1791><s%> Sheshbazzar, <S%H8339><s%> and laid <S%H3052><s%> the foundation <S%H787><s%> of the house <S%H1005><s%> of God <S%H426><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> is in Jerusalem: <S%H3390><s%> and since <S%H4481><s%> that time <S%H116><s%> even until <S%H5704><s%> now <S%H3705><s%> has it been in building, <S%H1124><s%> and yet it is not finished. <S%H8000><s%>

Now <S%H3705><s%> therefore, if <S%H2006><s%> it seem good <S%H2869><s%> to the king, <S%H4430><s%> let there be search <S%H1240><s%> made in the king's <S%H4430><s%> treasure <S%H1596><s%> house, <S%H1005><s%> which <S%H1768><s%> is there <S%H8536><s%> at Babylon, <S%H895><s%> whether <S%H2006><s%> it be so, that a decree <S%H2942><s%> was made <S%H7761><s%> of Cyrus <S%H3567><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> to build <S%H1124><s%> this <S%H1791><s%> house <S%H1005><s%> of God <S%H426><s%> at Jerusalem, <S%H3390><s%> and let the king <S%H4430><s%> send <S%H7972><s%> his pleasure <S%H7470><s%> to us concerning <S%H5922><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> matter. <S%H1836><s%>
